songs.title: Lonely Road
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I tried to get over you
I tried to find something new
But all i could ever do was fill my time
With thoughts of you
I tried to go somewhere old
To search for my pot of gold
But all i could ever hold inside my mind
Were thoughts of you

[Chorus 1]
I hear your music, and it's driving me wild
Familiar rhythms in a different style
I hear your music, and it's driving me wild again

[Chorus 2]
Don't want to let you take me down
Don't want to get hurt second time around
Don't want to walk that lonely road again

Yeah!
Oh, lonely, lonely road

[Chorus 1]
I hear your music, and it's driving me wild
Familiar rhythms in a different style
I hear your music, and it's driving me wild again

[Chorus 2]
Don't want to let you take me down
Don't want to get hurt second time around
Don't want to walk that lonely road again

Don't want to let you take me down
Don't want to get hurt second time around
Don't want to walk that lonely road again

[Outro]
I don't wanna walk that lonely road, no
Don't wanna, don't wanna walk that lonely road
Don't wanna walk that lonely road
I don't wanna walk it
No, no, no, no, no, no
I don't wanna
I don't wanna
I don't wanna walk that lonely road
I don't wanna walk that lonely road again
No, no, no, no
I don't wanna walk that lonely road
No, no
No, no

songs.full_title: From a Lover to a Friend by Paul McCartney
songs.title: From a Lover to a Friend
songs.title_with_featured: From a Lover to a Friend
songs.lyrics:
[Verse ]
And when the time comes around, we will be duty bound
To tell the through of what we've seen
And what we haven't found will not be going down
Despite too easy ride to see

[Chorus 1]
From a lover to a friend, take your own advice
Let me love again
Now that you turned out to be someone I can trust
Someone I believe

[Chorus 2]
Ohh la la la
How can i walk when i can't find a way
I have a dilemma
All i want is to tell me
You're going to take it away

[Chorus 1]
From a lover to a friend
Take your own advice, let me love again
Now that you turned out to be
Someone I can trust, someone I believe

[Bridge]
And what we haven't found
Will not be going down
Despite too easy ride to see

[Chorus 1]
From a lover to a friend, you turned out to be
Someone I believe
From a lover to a friend, take your own advice
Let me love again

[Chorus 2]
Ohh la la la
How can I walk when i can't find a way
I have a dilemma
All I want is to tell me
You're going to take it away

[Outro]
From a lover to a friend
From a lover to a friend
From a lover to a friend
Let me love again

songs.full_title: She's Given Up Talking by Paul McCartney
songs.title: She’s Given Up Talking
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
She's given up talking, don't say a word
Even in the classroom, not a dickie bird
Unlike other children, she's seen and never heard
She's given up talking, don't say a word

[Verse]
You see her in the playground standing on her own
Everybody wonders why she's all alone
Someone made her angry, someone's got her scared
She's given up talking, don't say a word

[Chorus 2]
But when she comes home, it's yap-a-yap-yap
Words are running freely like the water from a tap
Her brothers and her sisters can't get a word in edgeways
But when she's back at school again, she goes into a daze

[Chorus 2]
But when she comes home, it's yap-a-yap-yap
Words are running freely like the water from a tap
Her brothers and her sisters can't get a word in edgeways
But when she's back at school again, she goes into a daze

[Chorus 1]
She's given up talking, don't say a word
Even in the classroom, not a dickie bird
Unlike other children, she's seen and never heard
She's given up talking, don't say a word

[Outro]
She's given up talking
She don't say a word
Don't say a word
Don't say a word
Don't say a word
Don't say a word

songs.title: Driving Rain
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Let's go there and back again

[Verse 1]
If something's open, it's my heart
If something's missing, it's when we're apart
If something's good, it's when we're back together again
Nothing's wrong, it's just insane
Nothing's right until you're back again
Nothing's broken when it's softly spoken
And we're walking slowly down the lane

[Chorus 2]
Why don't we drive in the rain
Straight to the eye of the hurricane?
Go for a ride in the driving rain

[Chorus 1]
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Ooh, ooh
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Let's go there and back again
Baby, baby

[Verse 2]
You come walking through my door
Like the one that I've been waiting for
Letting sunshine in the darkest places when i've been going there again

[Chorus 2]
So why don't we drive in the rain
Straight to the eye of the hurricane?
Why don't we drive in the rain
Straight to the eye of the hurricane?
Go for a ride in the driving rain

[Chorus 1]
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Ooh, ooh
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Let's go there and back again
Baby, baby

[Bridge]
In the driving rain
Why don't we drive in the driving rain?

[Chorus 1]
1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Ooh, ooh
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Oh, let's go back again

1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Let's go for a drive
6, 7, 8, 9, 10
Let's go there and back again

[Outro]
You come walking through my door
Like the one that I've been waiting for

songs.title: I Do
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
If you only knew how much it meant to me
You'd understand, and I would feel your love was true

[Chorus 1]
This is all I want
This is all I need
This is all I long for
"I do"

[Verse 2]
Just remember this, after a time it's through
And evermore will there be days for me and you

[Chorus 2]
This is all I ask
All I ask of you
Please remember darling
I do love you

[Verse 3]
Days go by so quickly when you're having fun
But life is never easy even in the sun

[Verse 2]
But please remember this, after a time it's through
And evermore will there be days for me and you

[Chorus 3]
This is all I want
This is all I need
Darling please remember
I do love you

[Outro]
If you only knew

songs.title: Tiny Bubble
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Well, well
Oh, yeah
Mmm, hmm
Well, well
Oh, yeah
Mmm, yeah
Oh, yeah

[Verse 1]
If you're part of my love, don't leave home tonight
While we're sleeping we can learn to see that

[Chorus]
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside
Those of us who notice are expected to hide
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside the truth

[Verse]
When i look in your eyes
I can see the sky shining down upon the perfect garden

[Chorus]
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside
Those of us who notice are expected to hide
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside the truth

[Bridge]
You can't imagine just what i've been going through
I wouldn't wish it on a soul much less on you
I well remember when my heart was free
My soul could laugh, so could we

[Verse 1]
If you're part of my love, don't leave home tonight
While we're sleeping we can learn to see that

[Chorus]
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside
Those of us who notice are expected to hide
All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside the truth

[Bridge]
You can't imagine just what i've been going through
I wouldn't wish it on a soul much less on you
I well remember when my heart was free
My soul could laugh, so could we

[Verse 1]
If you're part of my love, don't leave home tonight
While we're sleeping we can learn to see that

All the world's a tiny bubble floating inside
All the world's a tiny bubble
All the world's a tiny bubble

songs.title: Magic
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
There must have been magic the night that we met
If I hadn't stopped you, I'd always regret

[Verse 1]
A few minutes later, you'd have been out that door
And i'd have been lonely forever more
Forever more

[Chorus 2]
Oh what made us do it?
Under what holy spell?
Nature's mother knew it
Only too well

[Bridge]
She reached out her fingers
To point at the sky
Leaving me helpless
Not knowing why

[Verse 2]
And this is the hour
That they turn out the light
Nothing but memories
Burning so bright
Burning so bright

[Chorus 2]
Oh what made us do it?
Under what holy spell?
Nature's mother knew it
Only too well

[Chorus 1]
There must have been magic the night that we met
If I hadn't stopped you, I'd always regret

[Outro]
There must have been magic
There must have been magic
There must have been magic the night that we met

songs.title: Your Way
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I like it, please don't take my heart away
It's happy where it is, so let it stay

[Chorus 1]
You gave me love
You gave me what i wanted
You gave me love your way

[Verse 2]
I've seen it shining from the furthest stars
Like Venus saw it on the way to Mars

[Chorus 1]
You gave me love
You gave me what i wanted
You gave me love your way

[Chorus 2]
Your way is strong
You way is right
Your way is mine tonight

[Verse 1]
I like it, please don't take my heart away
It's happy where it is, so let it stay

[Chorus 1]
You gave me love
You gave me what I wanted
You gave me love your way

[Chorus 2]
Your way is strong
You way is right
Your way is mine tonight

Your way is strong
You way is right
Your way is mine tonight

[Outro]
You gave me love your way

songs.full_title: Spinning on an Axis by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Spinning on an Axis
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
World spinning round to the next revolution
Sun going down, gonna rise up again

[Chorus 2]
I watch the sun go down with some sorrow
And now I know it's gonna come back tomorrow
Ain't no reason it has to do that
It's the season of the culture bat

[Chorus 3]
Spinning on an axis
Spinning on an axis
Staring in the face of time and space
Spinning on an axis

[Chorus 1]
World spinning round to the next revolution
Sun going down, gonna rise up again
World spinning round to the next revolution
Sun going down, gonna rise up again

[Bridge]
Hear me rising
Rise up and sing
Rise up
Rise up

[Verse]
Although I'm curious, it isn't a crime
I want to know if I'll find out in time
A lot of people busy doing their thing
Gonna wake up and sing early

[Chorus 3]
Spinning on an axis
Spinning on an axis
We ask the question, the answer's "yes"
Spinning on an axis

Yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus 2]
I watch the sun go down with some sorrow
And now I know it's gonna come back tomorrow
Ain't no reason why it has to do that
It's the season of the culture bat

[Chorus 2]
I watch the sun go down
Wonder if it's gonna come back
Certainly there's no guarantee
But I got a feeling it will be

[Chorus 3]
Spinning on an axis
Spinning on an axis
Spinning on, spinning on an axis
Spinning on an axis
Spinning on an axis

[Chorus 1]
World spinning round to the next revolution
Sun going down, gonna rise up again
World spinning round to the next revolution
Sun going down, gonna rise up
Gonna rise up
Gonna rise up
Gonna rise up
Gonna rise up again

[Outro]
World spinning round to the next revolution

songs.title: About You
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
One, two, three, four!

[Verse 1]
You give me power to get out of bed
When in the morning I'm feeling dead
Living and loving there's a lot to be said
It's true

[Chorus]
Going to say it about you
Say it about you

[Verse 2]
Out of the darkness and into the light
Straight to the centre of everything right
Darling, don't worry, the sky will be bright and blue

[Chorus]
When I say it about you
Going to say it about you
I'll say it about you

[Verse 3]
When did you teach me to fly thru the air?
Sooner or later, we all will be there
I read the headlines, and now I can swear
It's true

[Outro]
And they said it about you
Gonna say it about you
Gonna say it about you
Gonna say it about you
Gonna say it about you
Gonna say it about you

songs.title: Heather
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I'm going to fly to the moon
Check in outta space
Find me a suitable plot
Build myself a place
There I will stay for a year and a day
Until the cares of my life blow away
And I will dance to a runcible tune
With the queen of my heart

[Outro]
Heather

songs.full_title: Back in the Sunshine Again by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Back in the Sunshine Again
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
Here we are back in the sunshine again
No more worries and no more pain

[Verse 1]
We're leaving behind all our trouble and strife
And that's the way it's gonna be for the rest of my life

[Chorus 1]
Well, here we are, here we are
Back in the sunshine again
No more worries, no more worries
And no more pain, no more pain

[Chorus 2]
Life's too short to spend it lonely
You only throw it away
Listen to your voice of reason
Call it a day

[Verse 2]
Take a ride, take a ride
Out to the land of the free
Don't hurry take your time, take your time
Come and spend it with me

[Bridge]
Back in the sunshine
Back in the sunshine
Oh, yes

[Chorus 1]
Here we are
We're back in the sunshine again
No more worries, no more worries, no more worries
And no more pain

[Chorus 2]
Life's too short to spend it lonely
You only throw it away
Listen to your voice of reason
Call it a day


[Chorus 1]
Here we are
We're back in the sunshine again
No more worries, no more worries
And no more pain

[Chorus 1]
Here we are, here we are
Back in the sunshine again
No more worries, oh no
And no more pain
Why, why?

[Outro]
We're back in the sunshine again
No more worries
We're back in the sunshine again

songs.full_title: Your Loving Flame by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Your Loving Flame
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
How can I hope to reach your love?
Help me to discover what it is you're thinking of

[Chorus 2]
Because when we kiss, nothing feels the same
I could spend eternity inside your loving flame

[Chorus 3]
What am I to do if I don't have you?
I'll be feeling blue just sitting here without you
You could be the one to chase my blues away
Away

[Chorus 1]
So tell me how, how to reach your love
Help me to discover what it is you're thinking of

[Chorus 2]
Because when we kiss, nothing feels the same
I could spend eternity inside your loving flame

[Chorus 3]
What am I to do if I don't have you?
I'll be feeling blue just sitting here without you
You could be the one to chase my blues away
Away

[Chorus 2]
Because when we kiss, nothing feels the same
I could spend eternity inside your loving flame

[Chorus 1]
So tell me how (tell me how), how to reach your love (your love)
Help me to discover what it is you're thinking of

[Outro]
How can I hope to reach your love?
Here forever in your loving flame

songs.full_title: Riding Into Jaipur by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Riding Into Jaipur
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Riding to Jaipur
Riding through the night
Riding with my baby
Oh what a delight
Oh what a delight
It is

Riding to Jaipur
Riding through the night
Riding with my baby
Oh what a delight
Oh what a delight
It is

songs.full_title: Rinse The Raindrops by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Rinse The Raindrops
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Rinse the raindrops from your head
Wipe your eyes, go back to bed
In the morning, skies'll clear
And I'll be here
See the sunlight, break the ice
For the birds of paradise
Listen to the song they sing
Awakening

Rinse the raindrops from your head
Wipe your eyes, go back to bed
In the morning, skies will clear
And I'll be here
See the sunlight, break the ice
For the birds of paradise
Now listen to the song they sing
Awakening

Rinse the raindrops from your head
Wipe your eyes, go back to bed
In the morning, skies will clear
And I'll be here
See the sunlight, break the ice
For the birds of paradise
Now listen to the song they sing
Awakening
Awakening
Awakening
Awakening

songs.title: Freedom
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
This is my right
A right given by God
To live a free life
To live in freedom

[Chorus]
Talking about freedom
I'm talking about freedom
I will fight for the right
To live in freedom

[Verse 2]
Anyone tries to take it away
They'll have to answer, 'cause this is my right

[Chorus]
I'm talking about freedom
Talking about freedom
I will fight for the right
To live in freedom

I'm talking about freedom
Talking about freedom
I will fight for the right
To live in freedom

[Chorus]
Everybody talking about freedom
We're talking about freedom
We will fight for the right
To live in freedom

Talking about freedom
I'm talking about freedom
I will fight for the right
To live in freedom

I'm talking about freedom
I'm talking about freedom
We will fight for the right
To live in freedom
